title: Average Rate of Change Explorer
description: An interactive MicroSim that allows students to explore average rate of change by dragging two points along a curve and observing the secant line and slope calculation update in real-time.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Mathematics
Calculus
AP Calculus
learningObjectives: Calculate the average rate of change between two points on a curve
Demonstrate understanding of average rate of change as the slope of a secant line
Connect the algebraic formula to its geometric interpretation (rise over run)

controls.name: Point A
controls.description: Red draggable point on the curve representing the starting point (a, f(a))

controls.name: Point B
controls.description: Blue draggable point on the curve representing the ending point (b, f(b))

controls.name: Reset
controls.description: Reset points A and B to default positions

limitations: Points must remain within graph bounds
